mapper.sql:
a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.create_user as createUser, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.remark, a.update_date as updateDate, a.update_user as updateUser,
a.name, a.result_format as resultFormat, a.subscribe
mapper.select:
select
from sys_api_group a where delete_flag = 0 and subscribe = 1
